title: Line follower
desc: The teams are required to make an autonomous bot using IR sensors(or any other sensor deemed suitable). The bot has to follow a track of black lines on its own. It can't be manually controlled using wires or wirelessly.

title: Droid Rush
desc: It is a race of the bots. Your bot needs to be the fastest to complete the given trrack and leave all others behind.

title: Bridge It
desc: A bridge has to be designed on the spot with the help of popsicle sticks that can sustain the maximum load. 1 hour time would be given to the participants to complete the bridge after which certain penalties would be levied.

title: Puck Collector
desc: Two Remote Controlled robots compete in an arena. 10 pucks of each assigned colour are distributed randomly on the Arena. The aim is to collect all pucks of the assigned colour and carry them to the own home base.

title: Invento
desc: The objective of this competition is formulating solution of a problem using existing/emerging/novel concepts or technologies.

title: Robo Wrestle
desc: A manually controlled robot wired or wireless has to either push other robot out of arena or make it immobile. Robots can have pushing, toppling and braking mechanisms.

title: Catapult
desc: Each team must design, build and present a catapult that will accurately propel a tennis ball and the team who's ball transverses the maximum distance after being propelled will be declared winner.

title: Soap Cutting
desc: You will have to carve a block of soap into required shapes in the given period of time with the help of a blade and a scale.

title: Chem-O-Rocket
desc: Create your own mode of flying by architecting a chemical propelled rocket with the chemicals provided on the spot.

title: Technathalon
desc: Multiple rounds coding contest to be held overnight.

title: Switch Coding
desc: Each team (of 3) will be provided with 3 problems in which the teams would have to solve all the 3 problems simultaneously where each member will be dealing with a problem at a time.

title: Map My Town
desc: Plan a town for x number of people with all facilities like public transport, water and sewage network etc. Effective zoning and interdependency all of all activities should be the thumb rule to evaluate the models.

title: ACM ICPC Style Coding Contest
desc: A coding contest based on ACM International Collegiate Programming Contest.
